metadata.title: CVE-2024-23280 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An injection issue was addressed with improved validation. This issue isfixed in Safari 17.4, macOS Sonoma 14.4, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, watchOS10.4, tvOS 17.4. A maliciously crafted webpage may be able to fingerprintthe user.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
